EntryName	MILR1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Allergin-1 (Allergy inhibitory receptor 1) (Mast cell antigen 32) (MCA-32) (Mast cell immunoglobulin-like receptor 1)
GeneName	MILR1 C17orf60 MCA32
Length	343
Function	Immunoglobulin-like receptor which plays an inhibitory role in degranulation of mast cells. Negatively regulates IgE-mediated mast cell activation and suppresses the type I immediate hypersensitivity reaction (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
